root.name: Animal Soccer World
root.description: Animal Soccer World is collection of minigames revolving around the story of a group of talking animals (several of whom strongly resemble characters from Disney movies) setting up a soccer tournament. However the main reason this game gained any attention was for the animated film that serves as the games story. Once it was uploaded to youtube it became something of a meme due to the low quality of its voice acting, animation and overall presentation.
